channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Cheap TVs (2025): TCL, Hisense, and More
item.description: Save cash without sacrificing quality with one of these excellent budget TVs.

item.title: 15 Best White Noise Machines (2025): Lectrofan, Snooz, Hatch, and More
item.description: Help the whole family catch more z’s with soothing background noise from our favorite sound machines.

item.title: 8BitDo 64 Bluetooth Controller Review: For Human Hands
item.description: At last, a Nintendo N64 controller designed for two-handed humans.

item.title: Elon Musk says xAI has open sourced Grok 2.5
item.description: Elon Musk’s xAI has made an older version of its AI model Grok — specifically, the model weights used to shape Grok 2.5 — available on the open source...

item.title: Best 360 Cameras (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: It’s a small world after all, and these cameras can capture all of it at once, giving you a 360-degree view.

item.title: iPhone 17, the ‘thinnest iPhone ever,’ and everything else we’re expecting out of Apple’s hardware event
item.description: From a new slim iPhone Air model to redesigned AirPods, here's what to expect from this year's Apple event.

item.title: Best Heart Rate Monitors (2025), WIRED Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These chest straps and watches will help you keep your finger on your pulse—and many other heart-related metrics.

item.title: The Trump administration’s big Intel investment comes from already awarded grants
item.description: While Intel says the government is making an “$8.9 billion investment in Intel common stock,” the administration does not appear to be committing new ...

item.title: OpenAI warns against SPVs and other ‘unauthorized’ investments
item.description: OpenAI isn't the only AI company looking to crack down on SPVs.

item.title: Amazon AGI Labs chief defends his reverse acquihire
item.description: The former Adept CEO said he hopes to be "remembered more as "an AI research innovator" than a "a deal structure innovator."
